SELECT a.* , b.name AS branch_name , d.name AS def_branch_name , c.para_name AS status_name , e.emp_name AS employee_name , g.id as role_id, g.is_admin AS role_is_admin, g.role_name FROM dbo.T_Cm_User a LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Branch b ON a.branch_id = b.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Branch d ON a.def_show_branch = d.id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Code c ON a.user_status = c.para_value AND para_type = 'user_status' LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Emp e ON e.id = a.emp_Info_Id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_UserRole_Relation f ON a.id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN dbo.T_Cm_Role g ON g.id = f.role_id where $and{a.id = #id#} $and{a.branch_id = #branch_id#} $and{password = #password#} $and{user_name = #user_name#} $and{update_date = #update_date#} $and{emp_Info_Id = #emp_Info_Id#} $and{emp_name = #emp_name#} $and{user_status = #user_status#} $and{add_date = #add_date#} $and{update_opr = #update_opr#} $and{can_show_branch = #can_show_branch#} $and{accesskey = #accesskey#} $and{def_show_branch = #def_show_branch#} $and{is_admin = #is_admin#}
